net.lightstone.model
Class ChunkManager

java.lang.Object
  net.lightstone.model.ChunkManager

public final class ChunkManager
extends Object

A class which manages the Chunks currently loaded in memory.

Author:
Graham Edgecombe

Field Summary
private  Map<Chunk.Key,Chunk> chunks
          A map of chunks currently loaded in memory.
private  WorldGenerator generator
          The world generator used to generate new chunks.
private  ChunkIoService service
          The chunk I/O service used to read chunks from the disk and write them to the disk.
 
Constructor Summary
ChunkManager(ChunkIoService service, WorldGenerator generator)
          Creates a new chunk manager with the specified I/O service and world generator.
 
Method Summary
 Chunk getChunk(int x, int z)
          Gets the chunk at the specified X and Z coordinates, loading it from the disk or generating it if necessary.
